TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Clipboard extends System.Object
public ref class Clipboard abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供便于将数据传入和传出系统剪贴板的静态方法。

span.span: Provides static methods that facilitate transferring data to and from the system Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有应用程序 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 共享系统剪贴板，因此当你切换到另一个应用程序时，内容可能会更改。All applications for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] share the system Clipboard, so the contents are subject to change when you switch to another application. 有关可用于类的预定义格式的列表 ，请参见 类。For a list of predefined formats available to use with the class, see the class. **安全警报：** 出于安全考虑，应牢记以下几点。**Security Alert:** For security purposes, the following points should be kept in mind. - 粘贴操作需要用户启动 (Ctrl + V、粘贴菜单) 。Paste operations need to be user initiated (Ctrl-V, Paste Menu). - 副本只能对用户选择的内容。Copy can only be on user selected content. - 在复制或剪切时，部分信任代码会将纯文本和置于 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 剪贴板上。On copy or cut, partial trust code puts plaintext and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] on to the clipboard. 纯文本包含文本、Unicode 文本、OEM (对象交换模型) 文本和 CSV (逗号分隔值) 。Plaintext includes text, Unicode text, OEM (Object Exchange Model) text, and CSV (Comma-separated values). - 在粘贴时， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 如果该内容的源来自相同的受信任或更受信任的站点，则将粘贴。On paste, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] will paste in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] if the source of that content is from a equally trusted or more trusted site. 尤其是在下列情况下：Specifically: - 部分信任应用程序可以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 从完全信任的应用程序中进行粘贴。A partial trust application can paste [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] from a full trust application. - 部分信任应用程序可以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 从部分信任的应用程序中进行粘贴。A partial trust application can paste [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] from a partial trust application. - 完全信任应用程序只能从另一个完全受信任的应用程序中粘贴 XAML。A full trust application can paste XAML only from another fully trusted application. - 非 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 完全信任应用程序可以检查剪贴板上的 ApplicationTrust 格式，并根据需要净化 XAML。A non-[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] full trust application can examine the ApplicationTrust format on the clipboard and sanitize the XAML if appropriate. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将数据添加到系统剪贴板。The following example shows how to add data to the system Clipboard. [!code-csharp[DragDrop_DragDropMiscCode#_SetData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DragDrop_DragDropMiscCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_setdata)] [!code-vb[DragDrop_DragDropMiscCode#_SetData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DragDrop_DragDropMiscCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_setdata)]

span.span: About the Clipboard
Clipboard Operations
Using the Clipboard

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true`仅当剪贴板上存在指定的数据格式时，此方法才会返回; 此方法不会检查是否存在自动转换的数据格式。This method returns `true` only if the specified data format exists natively on the Clipboard; this method does not check for the presence of auto-convertible data formats.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅在以下情况下返回 `true` ：指定的数据格式以本机方式存在或可作为剪贴板上的自动转换的数据格式; 此方法不会检查是否存在自动转换的数据格式。This method returns `true` only if the specified data format exists natively or is available as an auto-convertible data format on the Clipboard; this method does not check for the presence of auto-convertible data formats. 位图将计算机图形表示为内存中的位数组，这些位表示图像中单个像素的特性。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.IDataObject GetDataObject() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDataObject () As IDataObject

summary.span: 返回表示剪贴板全部内容的数据对象。

span.span: Returns a data object that represents the entire contents of the Clipboard.

returns.span: 一个数据对象，它可以对系统剪贴板的全部内容进行访问；或者，如果剪贴板上没有数据，则为 。

span.span: A data object that enables access to the entire contents of the system Clipboard, or if there is no data on the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过 *数据对象*（即实现接口的对象）启用对系统剪贴板上的数据的访问 。Access to data on the system Clipboard is enabled through a *data object*, that is, an object that implements the interface. 预定义格式的列表由 类定义。A list of predefined formats is defined by the class. 使用 和中的字段指定的方法 来检查和提取数据对象中的数据。Use the methods specified by and fields in to examine and extract the data from the data object. 若要检查系统剪贴板上的数据格式，请 对此方法返回的数据对象调用。To examine the formats of data on the system Clipboard, call on the data object returned by this method. 若要从系统剪贴板中检索数据，请调用 并指定所需的数据格式。To retrieve data from the system Clipboard, call and specify the desired data format. 系统剪贴板由所有应用程序共享，因此，剪贴板上的数据可能会被其他应用程序更改。The system Clipboard is shared by all applications, so data on the Clipboard is subject to change by other applications.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection GetFileDropList() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetFileDropList () As StringCollection

span.span: A collection of strings, where each string specifies the name of a file in the list of dropped files on the Clipboard, or if the data is unavailable in this format.

span.span: Places a specified non-persistent data object on the system Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 当应用程序退出时，将从剪贴板中自动清除放置在系统剪贴板上的数据。By default, data placed on the system Clipboard with is automatically cleared from the Clipboard when the application exits. > [!NOTE] > 在应用程序退出时清除剪贴板的默认行为可能与其他实现不同，这可能会使剪贴板上的数据在应用程序退出时保留，而不是在默认情况下清除。The default behavior of clearing the Clipboard on application exit might differ from other implementations, which might leave data on the Clipboard on application exit rather than clearing it by default. 使用 重载并指定参数， `copy` 就好像 `true` 不希望在应用程序退出时从剪贴板清除数据。Use the overload and specify the `copy` parameter as `true` if you do not want data cleared from the Clipboard on application exit. > > 提供接口的基本实现 。 provides a basic implementation of the interface.

span.span: is .

span.span: to leave the data on the system Clipboard when the application exits; to clear the data from the system Clipboard when the application exits.

summary.span: 将指定的数据对象置于系统剪贴板中，并接受一个布尔参数，该参数指示应用程序退出时是否将数据对象保留在剪贴板中。

span.span: Places a specified data object on the system Clipboard and accepts a Boolean parameter that indicates whether the data object should be left on the Clipboard when the application exits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位图将计算机图形表示为内存中的位数组，这些位表示图像中单个像素的特性。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image. 此方法可添加启用了自动转换的数据。This method adds data with auto-conversion enabled.
